description:
This is round 2 of 4 of the live CHAMPIONSHIP matchup between Team Ice and The Dragons. Winner takes the title, losers get fucked.
Going into the locker room, Team Ice holds on to a small 52pt lead. The undefeated Dragons are losing and are not used to being down. The Dragons leave the mat sexually shaken and physically abused. Team Ice is up and has the emotional and physical advantage going into RD2. The Dragons come out strong and reduce the lead. They even briefly take the lead back, but Team Ice settles down and, using great wrestling techniques and strategy, out-play the Dragons and by the end of the round increase their lead by over 100pts. The Dragons come seconds away from being made to cum on the mat, but the final round buzzer saves them from the ultimate humiliation in the sport!
title: RD2: Girls helpless in wrestling holds, getting double teamed.
